column4: I need to forensically image a truecrypt drive, (No I'm not going to try and crack it from scratch, I have the key, or at least 90% of the key, I just need to get a disk image in case I screw up.) how do I determine the mount point so I can point dd at it?
You know, when people give me simple answers like that (and they work) I start to question my competency. Thank you.
